description.short: Real-time competitive intelligence and business monitoring platform
description.full:
SPIRAL Mobile provides business owners and executives with real-time competitive intelligence monitoring. Track competitor performance across major platforms including Amazon, Target, Walmart, and Shopify with AI-powered insights and automated analysis.

Key Features:
• Real-time competitive funnel monitoring
• Automated competitor analysis with AI insights
• Mobile admin dashboard for system health
• Push notifications for performance alerts
• Remote management capabilities
• Secure business data synchronization
• Cross-platform compatibility

Perfect for:
• Retail business owners
• E-commerce managers
• Marketing professionals
• Business analysts
• Competitive intelligence teams

Stay ahead of the competition with SPIRAL's advanced monitoring and analysis tools, all accessible from your iPhone.

reviewNotes: This app requires authentication to access business intelligence features. Test credentials can be provided if needed for review. The app connects to SPIRAL's secure API endpoints for real-time competitive data analysis.
